subtitle: Visit daily to receive an exclusive reward

tips.2: Time to earn points and show support
tips.3: There are 2 types of points you can earn
tips.5: Points for visiting the app daily for 14 days. Visit each day and say hi, collect the maximum amount of points to be eligible for unique rewards
tips.7: Points for inviting friends, each invited friend will bring you +5 points, make it to the top 500 to get the maximum rewards
tips.8: If you are reading this, know that you are so early!!

notifications.copy_referral: You have copied the referral link.

Select the appropriate bait from the in: Select the appropriate bait from the in game store.
Each lure attracts a specific type of fi: Each lure attracts a specific type of fish and offers different rewards
Each referred user will bring you 5 hook: Each referred user will bring you 5 hooks, which you can exchange for a reward at the end of the pre-season
Additionally, for every successful catch: Additionally, for every successful catch made by a user referred by you, you will receive 5% of the net profit
Visit the game daily throughout the pre-: Visit the game daily throughout the pre-game season to receive rewards of the highest quality.
